content.text:
# 13th Asia Pacific Screen Awards

| gold             =
| hall_of_fame     =
| best_film        = Parasite
| best_actor       = Manoj Bajpai
| best_actress     = Maxene Eigenmann
| most_wins        = Beanpole (2)
| most_nominations = So Long, My Son (6)
| network          =
| last             = 12th
| next             = 14th
}}
The 13th Asia Pacific Screen Awards were held on 21 November 2019 in Brisbane, Australia.
Winners and nominees
Complete list of winners and nominees:
{| class="wikitable
|-
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
|-
| valign="top" |
*'Parasite - Kwak Sin-ae and Bong Joon-ho '
** Balloon - Huang Xufeng, Jacky Pang Yee Wah
** Beanpole - Alexander Rodnyansky, Sergey Melkumov
** The Gold-Laden Sheep and The Sacred Mountain - Akshay Singh, Ridham Janve
** So Long, My Son - Xuan Liu
| valign="top" |
*'Adilkhan Yerzhanov - A Dark, Dark Man  '
**Lav Diaz - The Halt
** Elia Suleiman - It Must Be Heaven
**Anocha Suwichakornpong, Ben Rivers - Krabi, 2562
**Wang Xiaoshuai - So Long, My Son
|-
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
|-
| valign="top" |

| valign="top" |
